Texto: 
s/p turp procedure. multiple, pedunculated anechoic outpouchings originating posteriorly from - and communicating with - the main bladder lumen. the largest in diameter measures 35 mm. each demonstrates good through-transmission and no sonographic evidence for stasis. there are no stones. there is a significant post-void residual.
bladder diverticula
bladder diverticula - congenital vs acquired
post-operative anatomy
exophytic cyst
82 year old white male with recent hx of urinary retention despite flomax.
